akn:section.akn:heading: Practice of law by justices and judges

akn:content.akn:p:
§ 454. Practice of law by justices and judges Any justice or judge appointed under the authority of the United States who engages in the practice of law is guilty of a high misdemeanor. (June 25, 1948, ch. 646, 62 Stat. 908.)
Historical and Revision NotesBased on title 28, U.S.C., 1940 ed., § 373 (Mar. 3, 1911, ch. 231, § 258, 36 Stat. 1161). Changes in phraseology were made.
